VII.i.2.D.4.a
.
Laws Under Which DIC Is Payable
The marriage dates requirement for a DIC claimant differs depending on whether the claimant is potentially entitled to DIC under
38 U.S.C. 1310(a)
(deaths entitling survivors to DIC), or
38 U.S.C. 1318
(benefits for survivors of certain Veterans rated totally disabled at the time of death).
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
